name: sidenoder
description: SideNoder - oculus quest tool for sideloading, device tweaks, application managing, etc

scripts.postdist: npm run pack-win && npm run pack-mac
scripts.pack-win: cd out/win-unpacked && cp ../windows-install.bat ./ && 7za a sidenoder-$npm_package_version-win.zip  ./* && mv sidenoder-$npm_package_version-win.zip ../
scripts.pack-mac: cd out/mac && tar -czf sidenoder-$npm_package_version-mac.tar.gz  ./* && mv sidenoder-$npm_package_version-mac.tar.gz ../

author: vKolerts <str.mail.ru@bk.ru> (https://github.com/vKolerts/quest-sidenoder/)
